mapper.select: SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID GROUP BY REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY B.REP_ROUT_NM

SELECT ROUT_ID, ROUT_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}

SELECT A.ROUT_ID , A.NODE_ID , A.NODE_SN , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.LINK_ID , A.STTN_ID , A.STTN_NO , A.CRS_ID , A.ORGA_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.LINK_NODE_YN , B.MORN_STD , C.CRS_KIND , C.CRS_STS , C.PHASE_CNT , C.REMARK
, IF(H.CNT > 0 , 'CE001','CE002') COND_ERROR
FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_MST C ON A.NODE_ID = C.CRS_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID
LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST E ON A.NODE_ID = E.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT F.NODE_ID, COUNT(F.NODE_ID) CNT FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO F LEFT JOIN BMS_FCLT_COND_INFO G ON F.MNG_ID = G.MNG_ID WHERE FCLT_COND = 'FC021' GROUP BY NODE_ID) H ON E.NODE_ID = H.NODE_ID
WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' AND C.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND D.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND A.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
GROUP BY NODE_ID ORDER BY NODE_SN

SELECT A.NODE_ID , A.MOCK_NODE_ID , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_ENM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.ENTRY_RECOG_RADS , A.ADVNC_RECOG_RADS , A.USE_YN , A.UPD_DTM , A.UPD_ID , IF(D.CNT > 0 , 'CE001','CE002') COND_ERROR , E.ROUT_ID , E.NODE_SN
FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN E LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN F ON E.ROUT_ID = F.ROUT_ID AND E.LINK_ID = F.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST A ON E.NODE_ID = A.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST G ON G.ROUT_ID = E.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.NODE_ID, COUNT(B.NODE_ID) CNT FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO B LEFT JOIN BMS_FCLT_COND_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID WHERE FCLT_COND = 'FC021' GROUP BY NODE_ID) D ON A.NODE_ID = D.NODE_ID
WHERE (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND G.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND E.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND (A.NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%') || A.NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%'))
ORDER BY E.NODE_SN

SELECT A.ROUT_ID , A.NODE_ID , A.NODE_SN , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.LINK_ID , A.STTN_ID , A.STTN_NO , A.CRS_ID , A.ORGA_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.LINK_NODE_YN , A.PHASE_NO , B.MORN_STD , C.CRS_KIND , C.CRS_STS , C.PHASE_CNT , C.REMARK , E.CTR_STS , E.CTR_MODE , E.A_PHASE_NO , E.A_PHASE_TM , E.B_PHASE_NO , E.B_PHASE_TM
FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_MST C ON A.CRS_ID = C.CRS_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_SIGOPER_PHASE_INFO E ON C.CRS_ID = E.CRS_ID
WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT005' AND A.PHASE_NO IS NOT NULL AND C.DEL_YN != 'Y' AND E.CRS_ID IS NOT NULL
AND D.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND A.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND (A.NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%') || A.NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%'))
ORDER BY NODE_SN
SELECT TXT_VAL1 AS SIG_PERIOD FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'SYS_INFO' AND DL_CD = 'SY014'

SELECT MSG_ID , MSG_NM , MSG_CONTS
FROM BRT_OPER_INST_MSG_MST

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.SEND_DATE, '%H:%i:%s') SEND_DATE , A.FCLT_COND , B.FCLT_KIND , C.NODE_NM , C.NODE_ID , D.ROUT_NM
FROM BMS_FCLT_COND_LOG A LEFT JOIN BMS_FCLT_INFO B ON A.MNG_ID = B.MNG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN C ON B.NODE_ID = C.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON C.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID
WHERE C.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002' AND DATE_FORMAT(SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
AND D.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND D.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND (C.NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%') || C.NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%'))
GROUP BY A.SEND_DATE, A.MNG_ID ORDER BY A.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT A.LINK_ID , A.AVRG_SPD , B.GPS_X AS ST_GPS_X , B.GPS_Y AS ST_GPS_Y , C.GPS_X AS ED_GPS_X , C.GPS_Y AS ED_GPS_Y
FROM BMS_LINK_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST B ON A.ST_NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST C ON A.ED_NODE_ID = C.NODE_ID
WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.AVRG_SPD IS NOT NULL
